title: 3 Bed 2 Bath - August 1 MOVE IN - Updated Kitchen!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 301519728', 'Rent: $2,700 / Month', 'Beds: 3', 'Bath: 2', 'Available Date: 07/01/2022', 'Pet: No Pets', 'Parking:: street parking', 'Beautiful 3 Bed 2 Bath in Lower Allston available now!!', 'This beautiful property is located walking distance to Harvard Business School, Trader Joes, Dunkin Donuts and Star Market.', 'Easy access to MassPike.', '3 Large bedrooms and an additional room suitable for office space or storage.', 'Features include newly renovated eat in kitchen, updated appliances, hardwood floors and spacious bedrooms.', 'Laundry in building.', 'New blinds installed prior to move in.', 'MBTA Bus service outside your front door to Packards Corner Green Line B / Harvard Square Red Line.', 'Contact Chris to schedule your showing this week!', 'For inquiries..', 'Please email Chris with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!', 'ChrisP @ <URL>          860 - 309 - 8511', 'Bus: 64 Cambridge St @ Lincoln St (0.26 mi)', 'Bus: 66 N Harvard St @ Coolidge Rd (0.06 mi)', 'Bus: 86 N Harvard St @ Western Ave (0.17 mi)', 'Bus: 70 Western Ave @ N Harvard St (0.14 mi)', '301519728', 'Christopher Puzacke', 'Licensed Real Estate Professional', '107 Brighton Ave Boston, MA 02134', 'Cell: 860.309.8511', 'Click here to search all of our available apartments!', '<URL>/', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
